DOC.brief_summary: Effectiveness of a surgical adhesive on wounds found in Emergency Medicine.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Skin Affix in the Emergency Room
DOC.criteria: Greater than 5 years of age Requires the use of a surgical skin adhesive Informed consent signed Sensitivity to topical adhesive products or formaldehyde Hx keloid formation, hypotension, diabetes, blood clotting disorders Wound infections mucosal surfaces or skin exposed to body fluids
